item.title: Weighing up the data
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.3.4 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.7.2 ✔ stringr 1.2.0 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.2.0 ## ── Conflicts ───────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(forcats) library(lubridate) ## ## Attaching package: 'lubridate' ## The following object is masked from 'package:base': ## ## date library(modelr) # to perform modelling library(ggridges) # Ridgeline plots data = '.
